resources.string: House Rules is a project created by Nick Deas and Jacob Sargent. Originally, we designed the project using a Django back-end and envisioned it as a web service to be used from mobile browsers. However, since I was taking this class, I decided it would be a good use of my time to make an app for the service. Overall, I still think the web-service is the better route. Visit houserules.io for more information!
